summary: A British Intelligence Agent must track down a fellow spy suspected of being a double agent.
cast: George Peppard|Joan Collins|Judy Geeson|Oskar Homolka|Charles Gray|Nigel Patrick|Keith Michell|George Baker|Alexander Scourby|Peter Bull|Ernest Clark|Peter Dyneley|Gisela Dali|Stefan Gryff|Lewis Alexander|Jack Arrow|Jimmy Charters|Peter Evans|Ken Hutchins|Anthony Lang|Steve Plytas
title: El ejecutor
